'''''Amon Hen'' 295''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in June [[2022]].

==Contents==
* Front cover:  Adventures of Tom Bombadil by Norloth
* '''2''' - From the Editor’s Desk
* '''4''' - Tolkien Society Awards
* '''7''' - Tolkien’s Suitcase by Jessica Yates
* '''13''' - Review: Tolkien’s Library by Maria Zielenbach
* '''16''' - Memories of Priscilla
* '''18''' - Centerfold Art: Smaug by Anke Eissmann
* '''20''' - A Nightmare of Inspiration by Gustav B. Anderson
* '''23''' - Poem: Atlantis Haunting by Gustav B. Anderson
* '''24''' - Tolkien Treasury #5 by Chad High
* '''28''' - Behind Glass Doors
* '''30''' - News From Fangorn
* '''32''' - Members' Lounge
* '''33''' - Reflections: Tolkien Lecture Series: I Hold the Keyby Ian Collier
* '''34''' - All Brân
* Back Cover: Meneltarma by Ralph Damian
